document_data.name: Thilesin
document_data.mainbody: '''Thilesin''' was a [[sun elf]] priestess of [[Corellon Larethian]]. She in [[1374 DR]] joined the crusade of [[Seiveril Miritar]].
document_data.Personality: The [[elf|elven]] female was sombre and studious.
